Class AdoptionController

java.lang.Object
petadoption.controller.AdoptionController
public class AdoptionController extends Object
AdoptionController acts as the intermediary between the UI and the data model. It manages pet loading, sorting, adoption, and file persistence.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdoptionController()
    Constructs the controller and loads pets from JSON files.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdoptionController

      public AdoptionController() throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructs the controller and loads pets from JSON files.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if any required JSON file is not found

  • Method Details

    • getNonAdoptedPets

      public List<Pet> getNonAdoptedPets()
      Returns a list of all pets that have not been adopted.
      Returns:
      list of non-adopted pets

    • setView

      public void setView(AdoptFrame view)
      Sets the view for adoptable pets and loads the table.
      Parameters:
      view - the AdoptFrame view to control

    • sortPets

      public void sortPets(String option)
      Sorts pets based on the selected option and refreshes views.
      Parameters:
      option - sort type (e.g., "Sort by name", "Sort by age", "Sort by species")

    • adoptPet

      public void adoptPet(Pet pet)
      Marks a pet as adopted and refreshes the views.
      Parameters:
      pet - the pet to adopt

    • getAllPets

      public List<Pet> getAllPets()
      Returns a list of all pets currently in the shelter.
      Returns:
      list of all pets

    • findPetByIdAndName

      public Pet findPetByIdAndName(String id, String name)
      Finds a pet in the shelter by both its ID and name.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet
      name - the name of the pet
      Returns:
      the matching pet or null if not found

    • savePetsToFile

      public boolean savePetsToFile(String filePath)
      Saves the current list of pets to a specified JSON file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path where the file will be saved
      Returns:
      true if saving was successful, false otherwise

    • setManageView

      public void setManageView(ManagePets manageListFrame)
      Sets the view for managing pets (ManagePets) and allows table refresh.
      Parameters:
      manageListFrame - the manage view to set

    • addPet

      public boolean addPet(Pet pet)
      Adds a new pet to the shelter if its ID is unique.
      Parameters:
      pet - the pet to add
      Returns:
      true if the pet was added, false if ID already exists

    • removePetById

      public boolean removePetById(String id)
      Removes a pet from the shelter by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet to remove
      Returns:
      true if the pet was removed, false otherwise

    • getPetById

      public Pet getPetById(String id)
      Retrieves a pet from the shelter by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet
      Returns:
      the pet if found, otherwise null
